title: Downhill Rush: Forest Trailblazer
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, high-octane Comic Book style illustration, full-body dynamic shot of an aggressive mountain biker (female or male, gender neutral appearance in full dark protective gear and helmet) racing at high speed down a rugged dirt trail through a dense, sun-dappled forest. Extreme low angle, intense action, massive dust cloud kicking up behind the tires, prominent motion lines emphasizing speed and momentum. Style features: thick black outlines, vibrant flat colors, stylized shading (halftone effects), dramatic cinematic lighting filtering through the dense tree canopy. Panel includes comic sound effects like 'WOOSH!' and 'CLATTER!'. 16:9 aspect ratio.
negativePrompt: low quality, text, blurry, distorted, sketch, amateur drawing, missing limbs, deformed hands, monochrome, bad anatomy, grayscale, watermark, logo, easynegative, jpeg artifacts
